function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of multiple communication protocols in IoT applications can lead to interoperability issues and complexity in system integration.","Impact":"Increased risk of system failure and data inconsistency.","Mitigation":"Standardize communication protocols and implement robust data transformation and integration mechanisms.","Technologies":"Standardization protocols, API gateways, and message brokers.","People":"System integrators, IoT developers, and solution architects.","Owner":"Technology vendors, IoT platform providers."},{"Description":"Higher energy consumption of WiFi infrastructure compared to other options may impact operational costs and sustainability of the built environment.","Impact":"Increased energy expenses and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient IoT devices and systems, optimize network configurations, and explore alternative energy sources for IoT infrastructure.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient IoT devices, network optimization tools, and renewable energy solutions.","People":"Facility managers, sustainability experts, and IoT solution providers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management companies, and IoT technology providers."},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for strict QoS requirements and performance limitations of communication protocols may lead to suboptimal IoT system performance.","Impact":"Decreased reliability, responsiveness, and real-time data processing capabilities.","Mitigation":"Evaluate and select communication protocols based on QoS requirements, implement performance monitoring and optimization strategies.","Technologies":"QoS management tools, performance monitoring solutions, and protocol optimization frameworks.","People":"IoT architects, system designers, and performance engineers.","Owner":"IoT solution providers, system integrators, and performance optimization specialists."}]}
